channel.title: Jammu on NewsStreet
channel.description: Recent content in Jammu on NewsStreet

item.title: Financial powers of Panchayati Raj Institutions enhanced from 5 lakh to 1 Cr
item.description: Financial powers of Panchayati Raj Institutions enhanced from 5 lakh to 1 Cr Jammu Tawi, Nov 23: The Administrative Council (AC) which met here under the chairmanship of the Lieutenant Governor, Manoj Sinha, approved the delegation of powers for granting Administrative Approval to Gram Panchayats, Block Samitis and Zila Parishads for execution of works, the expenditure of which will be met out of Panchayatsâ€™ own resources.

item.title: People have rejected divisive politics in J&K: Bukhari
item.description: People have rejected divisive politics in J&K: Bukhari Jammu Tawi, Nov 23: Apni Party President Syed Mohammed Altaf Bukhari on Wednesday said people have rejected the divisive politics in Jammu and Kashmir which was responsible for seven decades of suffering.
